name: Lineage Planetary Yantra
description: Align your ancestral planetary energies with this sacred copper Yantra. Specifically energized to balance DNA-inherited karmic registries and bring cosmic protection to your lineage.

name: Ancestral Rudraksha Mala
description: Authentic Nepali Rudraksha Mala (108 beads). Helps in rhythmic meditation to clear inherited memory patterns and connect your consciousness with ancestral strengths.

name: Heritage Brass Shankh
description: High-quality Brass Shankh producing resonant frequencies designed to clear geopathic stress and hereditary energy blocks within your living space.

name: Genetic Protection Ring
description: Sri Yantra ring crafted to shield your genetic blueprint from negative psychic influences and attract prosperity across your family lineage.

name: Purification Kalash
description: Traditional pure copper Kalash for ancestral water rituals (Tarpanam). Ideal for purifying inherited energy fields and honoring your genetic roots.

name: Karmic Shiva Lingam
description: Natural Narmadeshwar Shiva Lingam. A powerful focal point for rituals aimed at dissolving deep-seated ancestral karma and empowering your family's spiritual DNA.
